thread.title: Actor Christopher Meloni Tweets Shirtless Selfie To #Resist Trump
thread.title_full: Actor Christopher Meloni Tweets Shirtless Selfie To #Resist Trump

author: Lindsey Ellefson
title: Actor Christopher Meloni Tweets Shirtless Selfie To #Resist Trump
text:
Actor Christopher Meloni Tweets Shirtless Selfie To #Resist Trump by Lindsey Ellefson | 5:17   Elliot Stabler Christopher Meloni (of Law and Order: SVU fame) is no fan of Donald Trump . Look at his Twitter and you’ll see! 
Actually, just keep looking at his Twitter. Specifically, look at this: The revolution is upon us. If u can’t see the con then u r willfully blind. #Resist . good nite pic.twitter.com/DmXeW8t7td 
— Chris Meloni (@Chris_Meloni) January 25, 2017 
He tweeted a shirtless selfie á la Fox’s Geraldo Rivera ! 
He’s been getting ribbed online, but it doesn’t appear to be anything he can’t take. 
All that Meloni has left to the imagination is what Mariska Hargitay will say about all this. 
[image: screengrab]
